review: it is great - love the access to movies, tv shows, musicthe original programming from Amozon is awesome too.
author: Peter Joshua Strub

review: So much free quantity with Prime and it works so much faster than trying to run apps through our tv or Blu Ray player. No regrets purchasing this box. We use it daily.
author: Ronne A. Pierce

review: DN turn on with my Sony tv.
author: su jin

review: It's great...except, I wish the storage capacity was larger. I have perhaps six games and Netflix on it and it tells me that I have to delete some apps because my storage is low. I would also like to see more games like Mario Bros on there!
author: M. Joseph "bookworm"

review: Easy to use. Easy to set up. Awesome interface
author: Dean Stewart

review: Awesome! Cut my expenses by buying Amazon tv! Has all the shows my son and I watch!
author: Stephany a.

review: Did exactly what I bought it to do.  Now can have access to apps and media straight from my phone via allcast app.
author: Yusuf khan

review: I bought this as a gift for someone and they loved it! It's really easy to use, and has so many different shows and movies,
author: Joshua White

review: Love it! I really like being able to watch all the shows whenever I want.
author: Teresa L. Bowers
